id.description: The unique identifier of the solution article.

agent_id.description: The ID of the agent who created the solution article.

category_id.description: The ID of the category to which the solution article belongs.

description.description: The HTML formatted content of the solution article.

description_text.description: The plain text version of the solution article content.

folder_id.description: The ID of the folder where the solution article is stored.

hits.description: The number of times the solution article has been viewed.

status.description: The status of the solution article (draft, published, etc.).

meta_title.description: The meta title for the solution article.

meta_description.description: The meta description for the solution article.

meta_keywords.description: Keywords associated with the solution article.

tags.description: Tags associated with the solution article.

thumbs_down.description: The number of dislikes or negative reactions to the solution article.

thumbs_up.description: The number of likes or positive reactions to the solution article.

title.description: The title of the solution article.

created_at.description: The date and time when the solution article was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the solution article was last updated.
